about.title: Web Architect &
about.subtitle: Rare dual expertise: technical and SEO skills serving your digital projects.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: After a Technical Baccalaureate and a few small jobs, I went back to school at 21 for a degree in e-commerce. This led me to work for 6 years in SEO, where I learned how the professional world works, teamwork, and natural referencing management. Working closely with developers made me want to dive into the technical world. I enrolled in a 6-month bootcamp, then continued with a Web and Mobile Application Developer degree in a work-study program, specializing in React and Node.js. Since then, I've joined several companies for complete integrations, delivering projects on time and adding features. Today, I master Agile methodology, Clean Code principles and CI/CD pipelines. Web Developer since 2020, I particularly enjoy working with Nuxt & Next.js to transform mockups into dynamic and interactive websites.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Code is not an end in itself, it's a means to create performant solutions.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: I code methodically following SOLID and DRY principles to ensure project stability.

agile.title: AGILE
agile.description: My developer experience allows me to optimize our process according to your needs.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: I favor a long-term vision. Every decision guarantees quality results.

why.title: Why choose
why.description: Most devs ignore SEO. Most SEOs don't know how to code.
why.conclusion: I bridge both worlds. I don't just code to make it work, I code so Google understands your site and your users stay.
